name: Rhombuses
description:
You are given a number N of points in a 2d plane. Find how many rhombuses can be found with them. (A rhombus is a quadrilateral with four sides of equal lengths)

Input from stdin:

one line containing the number N

followed by N pairs of integers consisting in the coordinates X and Y of the points

Output into stdout:

One number representing the number of rhombuses that can be created

Restrictions

N < 50 ; -5000 < X, Y < 5000
